Name: Absorption: River Puddle Shower Power
Desc:
Dragon Vein Skill, Absorption Skill
When Spirit Sprinkling hits, the naughty Aqua Spirit shows up along with the river puddle and attacks enemies by spraying water.

H.Old:
When Spirit Sprinkling hits for 90 sec, Aqua Spirit shows up to attack 6 enemies at 510% damage 10 times.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec.
H.New:
When Spirit Sprinkling hits for 90 sec., the Aqua Spirit appears and attacks up to 6 enemies at 510% Damage 10 times.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec.

When Spirit Sprinkling hits for 90 sec, Aqua Spirit shows up to attack 6 enemies at 510% damage 10 times.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec.
